column1: ?1, I've seen McDonald's fryers less greasy than your hair
?1, there's pieces of paper less pasty than you
?1 is a colossal waste of oxygen to be honest
It is impossible to fathom the degree to which ?1 has failed in life
It's not even worth insulting ?1 at this point
?1, ?2 thinks you're a chocka-block looking asshole
?1 is like a sea urchin. A sea urchin eats with it's anus, and therefore just like ?1, all that comes out of it's mouth is shit
?1 is a 'big stupid glaikit eejit' - scottish person
What the fuck was God thinking when he created ?1?
I feel sorry for ?2 for having to interact with ?1
